name: Occult à la Carte
description:
Look for 3 impossible meals using substitutions, eggs, and all manner of (not) witchery.

An adventure game made for Touhou Game Jam 7.

Controls:

Arrow keys
MovementZ/X
Pick up/drop and/or combine objects
Left click/Ctrl
Advance dialogue/Skip dialogue
Right click
Open graphics and sound settings
SpaceFly (during select sections)

Credits:

Jacoder23Programming, Art, Writing
Miles "Chuunibyou" YalzinMusicJulioSillet & SOIAwesome people who shared their 3D assets online, check them out!

Technical specs

The game has 4 graphical presets. High and above is recommended for computers with dedicated graphics. Medium and below is recommend for computers with integrated graphics. These recommendations assume running the game at 1080p, your mileage may vary.

If the game breaks or you want to break the game:

Type "mima" at any point to open up the dev console and "help" to see a list of commands.
